mapper.select:
SELECT su.id AS id, su.tenant_id AS tenantId, su.account AS account, su.nickname AS nickname, su.real_name AS realName, su.gender AS gender, su.email AS email, su.mobile AS mobile, su.status AS status, su.avatar AS avatar, su.country AS country, su.province AS province, su.city AS city, su.area AS area, su.street AS street, su.comments AS comments, su.create_time AS createTime, su.creator AS creator, su.update_time AS updateTime, su.operator AS operator, sr.id AS roleId, sr.role_key AS roleKey, sr.role_name AS roleName, so.id AS organizationId, so.organization_name AS organizationName, sou.id AS organizationUserId, sou.is_primary AS isPrimary, sou.is_auto AS isAuto FROM t_sys_user su INNER JOIN t_sys_organization_user AS sou ON su.id = sou.user_id AND sou.del_flag = 0 INNER JOIN t_sys_organization so ON sou.organization_id = so.id AND so.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN t_sys_role sr ON sou.role_id = sr.id AND sr.del_flag = 0 WHERE su.del_flag = 0
AND su.id = #{user.id}
AND su.account like concat('%', #{user.account}, '%')
AND su.nickname like concat('%', #{user.nickname}, '%')
AND su.real_name like concat('%', #{user.realName}, '%')
AND su.mobile like concat('%', #{user.mobile}, '%')
AND su.email like concat('%', #{user.email}, '%')
AND su.status = #{user.status}
AND so.id = #{user.organizationId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(su.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{user.beginDateTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(su.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{user.endDateTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY su.create_time DESC
